title: League is unresponsive!
body: So I tried loading into a blind game and the practice tool, and the blind game froze at champ select, I couldn't even see anything but a black screen... and practice tool would freeze at loading screen after champ select. What do I do?

replies.body:
Those types of black screens in champion select typically mean that your client can't get a solid connection with the game lobby, possibly due to some out of whack network settings. Check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game as well. 

Hit me back if you don't see much of a change and we can do a little more digging!
Great, after fully repairing the client, I can't even stay logged in. The entire client just freezes if I do anything.
